name: Wobbledogs
summary: A 3D pet simulation where you raise your own personal hive of mutating dogs, physically simulated all the way down to their guts! Wobbledogs is a casual and chill sandbox for players of all ages who want to care for their very own virtual pets in a surprising, unique, and stress-free environment.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Pet simulation
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2021年1月28日(Early Access)
  • 官方网站: https://wobbledogs.com/
  • 开发: Animal Uprising
  • 发行: Animal Uprising
